name: Lumis 4-Piece Modular Snow White Performance Fabric Sectional Sofa
details: Low-slung sectional by Barcelona-based Mermelada Estudio is designed for lounging. Upholstered in a textured, linen-like performance fabric, the sectional's deep frame is topped with pillow-like cushions finished with a clean piping welt. Arrange and rearrange sectional pieces to fit your changing needs. CB2 exclusive.

name: Lumis 4-Piece Modular Grey Performance Fabric Sectional Sofa
details: Sink into relaxed luxury with this low-slung design by Barcelona-based Mermelada Estudio. Formed of four modular pieces, the sectional's deep, pillow-topped seat and back cushions are finished with a clean piping welt in a soft, linen-like performance fabric. Arrange and rearrange sectional pieces to fit your changing needs. CB2 exclusive.

name: Lumis 4-Piece Modular Snow White Performance Fabric Sectional Sofa
details: Sink into relaxed luxury with this low-slung design by Barcelona-based Mermelada Estudio. Formed of four modular pieces, the sectional's deep, pillow-topped seat and back cushions are finished with a clean piping welt in a soft, linen-like performance fabric. Arrange and rearrange sectional pieces to fit your changing needs. CB2 exclusive.

name: Lumis Snow White Performance Fabric Armless Chair
details: Sink into relaxed luxury with this low-slung design by Mermelada Estudio. Certified sustainable by the Forest Stewardship Council ® (FSC), the armless chair wood frame is paired with deep, pillow-topped seat and back cushions. Soft, linen-like performance fabric is finished with a clean piping welt. Pair with the ottoman or corner chair for a configuration that fits your space. CB2 exclusive.

details: Sink into relaxed luxury with this low-slung design by Mermelada Estudio. Certified sustainable by the Forest Stewardship Council ® (FSC), the corner chair wood frame is paired with deep, pillow-topped seat and back cushions. Soft, linen-like performance fabric is finished with a clean piping welt. Pair with the ottoman or armless chair for a configuration that fits your space. CB2 exclusive.
